name: Did You Snail?
description:
Have you ever played Will you Snail? I dont mean the Demo versions, I mean the Beta versions. Yes? Well then this game probably isnt for you. No? Then you are at the right place. This game has many levels from the original game and many many more original ones. A whole new story to explore and finish based on what we have gathered. This game is a single man project; created by me, Armaxton! Of course credits to Jonas Tyroller for the main music (which i might change) and for you know... Just the whole game idea. 

(THIS GAME IS CURRENTLY IN ALPHA)

Discord link: https://discord.gg/mU4MENuNE2
